channel.title: Open Component Model on
channel.description: Recent content in Open Component Model on

item.title: Docs
item.description: Get started # There are two main ways to get started with Doks: Tutorial #

2 Open Component Model Specification # 2.1 Model Elements 2.2 Model Operations 2.3 Storage backend Mappings 2.4 Formats and Names 2.5 Extension Points This specification is divided into three parts: Layer 1: The model elements defined by the Open Component Model Layer 2: The abstract model operations , which must be provided to interact with those model elements stored in any OCM persistence Layer 3: The interoperability specifications describing how the model elements are mapped to elements of an underlying persistence layer (for example and OCI registry) Layer 1 describes the elements and data formats the Open Component Model deals with.
